channel.title: water on My Blog
channel.description: Recent content in water on My Blog

item.title: Succumb
item.description: Succumb Life seems to be about choices choices, there many are, in this glorious age of chemical effluence to succumb For a river my age, it’s a choice of how to succumb (I am a river) To succumb to the plastic debris littering my banks, waiting to sink in and numerous as locusts in a swarm, decorate my floor like petals on a just-wed couple’s wedding bed floating to the top, once in a while
